org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.simpleocm.build

Class NodeBuilderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.simpleocm.build.NodeBuilderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBinder, NodeBuilder, PropertyBuilder

    public class NodeBuilderImpl
extends Object
implements NodeBuilder, PropertyBuilder
    A node builder, to build a node in the repository from an annotated bean.

      • createNode

        public javax.jcr.Node createNode(javax.jcr.Node parent,
                                 String name,
                                 Object obj,
                                 boolean sameNameSiblings)
                          throws org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException
        Description copied from interface: NodeBuilder
        Creates a node for an object and appends it to the parent node.
        Specified by:
        createNode in interface NodeBuilder
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent node
        name - the name of the new node
        obj - the obj (annotated bean) which reflects the data for the node
        sameNameSiblings - if true it will create new child nodes with same names, otherwise returns the existing child with that name
        Returns:
        the new created node, or existing child node if sameNameSiblings is false
        Throws:
        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException - if creating the node fails
        See Also:
        NodeBuilder

      • bind

        public boolean bind(Object object,
                    javax.jcr.Node node)
             throws org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException
        Bind all @see org.onehippo.forge.psutils.simpleocm.JcrPath annotated fields to the passed node. Also takes care of inheritance and loops up, to check the fields of the super classes. The session, or node needs to be saved to persist the changes.
        Specified by:
        bind in interface org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBinder
        Parameters:
        node - the node to populate
        object - the @see org.onehippo.forge.psutils.simpleocm.JcrNodeType annotated object
        Throws:
        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException - also @see org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBinder#bind

      • build

        public javax.jcr.Node build(javax.jcr.Node parent,
                            String nodeName,
                            Object object)
                     throws org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException
        Builds the node with all annotated properties and child nodes. The session, or node needs to be saved to persist the changes.
        Specified by:
        build in interface NodeBuilder
        Parameters:
        parent - parent node to add the child to
        nodeName - the name of the new node to create
        object - the object to marshal to JCR
        Returns:
        a new Node or null if the nodetype cannot be annotated
        Throws:
        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException
        See Also:
        NodeBuilder.createNode(javax.jcr.Node, String, Object, boolean), ContentNodeBinder.bind(Object, javax.jcr.Node)
